name: Lit (itch) (Tekugare)
description:
Lit is a simple beat 'em up. Where every move has a dual purpose. Even the buttons have a multiple purposes!

Only Three buttons, but a variety of special moves.

I wasn't able to finish the game in time for the GMTK Jam :[                                                    You can check that version out here and/or check out the most recent updated version here as well!

Controls: Left and Right Arrow Keys and the A key.]

  • Left and Right:
    • hold to Move in either direction.
    • Double tap to Inferno Punch.
  • A:
    • Tap to Jump.
    • Double tap to do a Blazing Upper Cut.
    • Hold and Release to Throw a Magma-ball.

Tips!:

You have a limited "Fire" resource, shown by the gauge at the bottom. Refill your Fire Gauge by landing. You can cancel out of an Inferno Punch with a jump at no extra cost to you Fire Gauge. 

Most recent update - v1.0 - I have added an enemy (but it doesn't hurt you). Killing the enemy refills you Fire Gauge a little. Your jump now discharges fire, turning it into another attack in your arsenal. I've made the Fire Gauge prettier! ^-^

I hope you have fun !
